name: Oppenheimer
synopsis: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

name: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
synopsis: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence.
director: Joaquim Dos Santos, Kemp Powers, Justin K. Thompson

name: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
synopsis: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team must track down a dangerous weapon before it falls into the wrong hands.

name: John Wick: Chapter 4
synopsis: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy.

name: Killers of the Flower Moon
synopsis: When oil is discovered in 1920s Oklahoma under Osage Nation land, the Osage people are murdered until the FBI intervenes.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
synopsis: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own.

name: Dune: Part Two
synopsis: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

name: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny
synopsis: Archaeologist Indiana Jones races against time to retrieve a legendary artifact that can change the course of history.

name: The Marvels
synopsis: Carol Danvers gets her powers entangled with those of Kamala Khan and Monica Rambeau, forcing them to work together to save the universe.
